description:
Shirakawa Miyako is http://anidb.net/ch90513 [Itsuki]`s classmate at college who at first had a bad first impression towards each other. While Miyako does not understand Itsuki`s stories, she became his fashion adviser to help him with his novel. After Itsuki dropped out college, Miyako still comes to see him.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shirakawa Miyako
